description.multi: This plugin will generate Lorem Ipsum text for use as dummy texts on webpages. _ It works in templates with tag #INSERT_HEAD in its html head _ Then you can use it as a model loremX<>/code> where X is the integer amount of units (defined in 'type') to insert. _ It accepts these parameters: - {{type}}: Allows you to specify what kind of result you want to see. You may use: paragraphs, words or characters. If you don't set this, paragraphs will be use by default. - {{amount}} it's only neccesary if you call it from a template i.e: #MODELE{lorem}{amount=3}. - {{ptags}}: Allows you to add P<>/code> around each paragraph. True or false. True by default.
